message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but I'm leaving you a good chunk. Take it or we can play this out longer, but remember, the money will be worth less with each round.

Your offer was quite greedy. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split in your favor. This ensures you get a good share, and I get something worthwhile before inflation eats away at it too much.  What do you say?
